title: Raiders Go All In
description:
Field Yates and the NFL Live crew discuss the Raiders giving out 5 deals worth over 435 Million this offseason and Davante Adams’ comments on why he wanted to be traded. Plus who has and hasn’t shown up for mandatory mini camp.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: NFL Live: The Raiders spending spree this offseason and Davonte Adams speaks on why he wanted a trade.
